# harness_platform_infra_provider_version (Data Source)

Data source for retrieving a specific Terraform/OpenTofu Provider Version from the IaCM Provider Registry.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "harness_platform_infra_provider_version" "aws_v5" {
  provider_id = "provider_id"
  version     = "5.0.0"
}

output "gpg_key_id" {
  value = data.harness_platform_infra_provider_version.aws_v5.gpg_key_id
}

output "protocols" {
  value = data.harness_platform_infra_provider_version.aws_v5.protocols
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `provider_id` (String) The ID of the provider this version belongs to.
- `version` (String) Version number (e.g., 1.0.0).

### Read-Only

- `gpg_key_id` (String) GPG key ID for signing.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `protocols` (List of String) Supported Terraform protocol versions.
